author: erans
msg: Reverting most of the changes performed in revision 1336458, because the
caching of the hash code could be the source of inconsistent behaviour,
and we are lacking proof that the performance gain is worth it.
The implementation (from r1336458) of the "hashCode" method is retained.

author: tabish
msg: disable this test for now as it can cause a segfault and stop the rest of the tests

author: tabish
msg: Refactor the LinkedBlockingQueue to handle thread interrupt and fix the purge method to prevent stack overflow errors.
